title: En ru Pathian Beramno sual phurtu
lyrics:
En r'u, Pathian Beramno sual phurtu,
A hming Kalvari tlangah chuan;
Thing anchhedawng chungah chuan an khai kang,
Ka tan a thisen hlu a luang chhuak.

Chhandamtu nak thianghlimah chuan,
Thisen leh tui a lo luang chhuak;
Ka thinlungin theihnghilh suh se,
Mi sual faina lui chu.

Hmangaihna lui thianghlim a luang - tah chuan,
Chhandamtu thihna hmunah chuan;
Chhun zanin chutah chuan va leng ang che,
Ka thlarau, i Chhandamtu hnenah.

Tu pawh chu thisen luia inbual chu,
An sual vur aiin a var ang;
Aw, i sual bawlhhlawh chu rawn sil fai la,
Lo kal rawh aw, Chhandamtu'n a ti.

Ka vah bosan tawh lo'ng khawvelah hian,
Ka hmangaih, ka Lal Chhandamtu;
Aw, i Thlarau Thianghlilmin min hruai la,
I hmel duh awm chu min hmuhtir rawh.
